text: Nasir Ahmad El-Rufai was born on 16th February 1960. He is the Nigerian politician and the current governor of Kaduna state. == Biography == El-Rufai was former minister of Federal capital territory, Abuja, between 2003 and 2007, and for director general of Bureau of Public Enterprises. == Education == El-Rufai obtained his SSCE at Barewa College Zaria. He holds a bachelor's degree in Quantity Survey from Ahmadu Bello University, Zaria, master's degree in business administration. == References == Category:1960 births Category:Living people
title: Nasir Ahmad El-Rufai
